sentences.en: A larcenous tendency restricted to shady operators and others of that ilk.
sentences.cn: 局限于靠不住的经营者及那种人的一种偷窃倾向.

sentences.en: Encryption systems and their ilk are technologies of disconnection.
sentences.cn: 加密系统还有它们的同类都是隔离的技术.

sentences.en: Fuld, you and your ilk are an obscenity.
sentences.cn: 福尔德先生, 你和你的那伙人,都是下流胚.

sentences.en: He currently terrorises politicians and their ilk on "Newsnight"
sentences.cn: 他目前在《新闻之夜》节目中的讲话搞得政客们惶恐不安。

sentences.en: He's called Snook, and he lives in a village of that ilk.
sentences.cn: 他叫斯努克, 住在斯努克村.

sentences.en: Here we investigated whether integrin - linked kinase ( ILK ) may regulate LV remodeling and function after myocardial infarction.
sentences.cn: 本研究调查了整合素相关肌酶 ( ILK ) 是否可以调节心肌梗死后左室重塑及功能.

sentences.en: I can't stand him, or any others of that / his ilk.
sentences.cn: 他这类人的行为我无法忍受.

sentences.en: ILK, α - SMA and Vimentin in renal tubular epithelial cells were detected by immunohistochemistry analysis.
sentences.cn: 免疫组织化学法检测肾小管上皮细胞α-平滑肌肌动蛋白(α-SMA)、波形蛋白(Vimentin)与ILK的表达.

sentences.en: Methods: Using cell culture and Western blot, the TGF - � � 1 - induced expression of FN and ILK was tested.
sentences.cn: 方法培养人肾小管上皮细胞(HKC),用蛋白印迹方法检测TGF - β1诱导HKC合成 FN和表达ILK的作用.

sentences.en: Overexpression of ILK in HKC tansfered with pCMV - wtILK could induce FN expression.
sentences.cn: 转染pCMV-wtILK质粒的HKC细胞,其FN的表达呈增加趋势.

sentences.en: Results In normal kidney tissues, ILK was mainly located in the glomerular visceral epithelial cells.
sentences.cn: 结果在正常组肾组织, ilk主要表达于肾小球脏层上皮细胞.

sentences.en: Results In normal kidney tissues, ILK was mainly located in the glomerular visceral epithelialcells.
sentences.cn: 结果在正常组肾组织, ILK主要表达于肾小球脏层上皮细胞.

sentences.en: The Morgans, Warburgs, and their ilk amassed fortunes that gave them tremendous political power.
sentences.cn: 摩根、沃伯格之类的家族积累了大量财富，给予其巨大的政治力量。

sentences.en: the world of media people and their ilk
There was the positive expression of Hsp 90 in 27 of the 28 ILK positive samples.
sentences.cn: 其中28例ILK阳性 者中有27位Hsp90表达阳性.

sentences.en: Where others of his ilk have battled against drugs, Gabriel's problems have centred on his marriage.
sentences.cn: 加布里埃尔的同辈都在与毒品作斗争，而他的问题却集中在他的婚姻上。
